summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of redesigned Premium Dark Sidebar Navigation. All 8 requested features working correctly: dark sidebar theme, navigation between Parties submodules, breadcrumb updates, search modal (⌘K/Ctrl+K), user profile dropdown, Add New button, module expansion/collapse, and active state highlighting.

console_warnings.issue: React warning: Each child in a list should have a unique 'key' prop

features: Innovate Books Commerce Suite branding with gradient logo
Quick search button with ⌘K shortcut indicator
Parties module with expansion (Overview, Customers, Vendors, Partners, Channels, Profiles)
Catalog module with expansion (Items, Pricing, Costing, Rules)
Revenue module with expansion (Leads, Evaluate, Commit)
Governance module with expansion (Policies, Authority, Audit)
User profile dropdown at bottom with name, email, Profile link, Log out button
Helpful text 'Type to search customers, vendors, partners...'

active_state_highlighting.item_highlight: Dark background (bg-slate-800) with white text and blue icon

critical_code_review_comments: VendorsList.jsx still has React key prop warning - should add unique key to list items (minor, carried over from previous iteration)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Premium dark sidebar navigation fully redesigned and tested. All navigation features working: dark sidebar with module expansion, breadcrumb updates, search modal (⌘K/Ctrl+K), user profile dropdown, Add New button, module expansion/collapse animation, active state highlighting. Minor console warning in VendorsList for React key prop. All Parties submodule pages load correctly with data.
